briefTitle: Effect of Opioid Free Anesthetic on Post-Operative Opioid Consumption After Laparoscopic Bariatric Surgery

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adult patients undergoing elective laparoscopic bariatric surgery (i.e. laparoscopic roux-en-Y gastric bypass, laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy) able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any opioid use within 4 weeks prior to surgery
* Chronic antiemetic use
* Conversion of laparoscopic to open surgery
* Patients unable to provide post-operative pain scores
* Pregnant or lactating patients
* Patients under 18 years of age
* Refusal or inability to provide informed consent

outcomeMeasures.title: 24 Hour Opioid Consumption
outcomeMeasures.description: Total amount of opioid use within the first 24 hours after surgery in mg of oral morphine equivalent doses

outcomeMeasures.title: Length of Time Under General Anesthesia
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from induction to emergence of anesthesia

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients With Opioid-related Adverse Effects
outcomeMeasures.description: Adverse effects include postoperative nausea, vomiting, pruritis, and respiratory depression. Some subjective, patient-reported data collection failed; these participants were excluded from this outcome.

outcomeMeasures.title: Length of Time to Recover From General Anesthesia
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from arrival to PACU to "ready for PACU discharge"

outcomeMeasures.title: Length of Hospital Stay
outcomeMeasures.description: Time from PACU arrival to discharge date and time in days

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Patient Satisfaction With Analgesia: Yes or no
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of Participants With Overall Patient Satisfaction With Analgesia

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Post-surgical Opioid Prescription Refills up to 30 Days
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participates with opioid prescription refills since surgery within 30 day after surgery

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients Treated for General Anesthetic Adverse Effects
outcomeMeasures.description: Episodes of severe bradycardia or treated hypotension intraoperatively

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Post-surgical Opioid Prescription Refills Between 30 Days to 3 Months After Surgery
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participates with opioid prescription refills since surgery between 30 day and 3 months after surgery
